channel.title: Cache Downloader [PI] Of...doom?
channel.description:
I've followed some tuts on the cachedownloader, Got it to work fine, but It'll extract the cache in a single zip to the designated folder.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2v2zfip.png[/img]
anyway to make it extract what's INSIDE the "cache" zip folder, instead of just placing the folder.?
EDIT: If this should go under Server help i apologize.
